page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff - Daniel Bass
page.description: Hear about how we built a sophisticated and user configurable Slack Bot which gives customized trade reports to financial analysts using Serverless technologies on Azure. Learn the patterns we used and the architectural decisions we made from an experienced Serverless Enterprise developer and author.

speaker.name: Daniel Bass
speaker.title: Senior Developer at Investment Management firm and published author
speaker.bio: Daniel is a Senior Developer at a large Investment Management firm in the City of London. He is the author of 2 books on Serverless - “Beginning Advanced Serverless Architectures with Microsoft Azure”. He loves travelling around the world and learning to cook vegetarian dishes from different cuisines.

talk.title: Serverless Slack Bots with Azure Durable Functions
talk.abstract: Hear about how we built a sophisticated and user configurable Slack Bot which gives customized trade reports to financial analysts using Serverless technologies on Azure. Learn the patterns we used and the architectural decisions we made from an experienced Serverless Enterprise developer and author.
